name: Northern Ireland Food and Drink Association Ltd
membership: NIFDA is a member of the Confederation of British Industry Northern Ireland Branch.
goal: NIFDA's vision is a strong and united membership working together towards a sustainable and growing internationally competitive food and drink Industry in Northern Ireland.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All EU initiatives , policies and legislative files that impact upon Agri-Food production and trading.
